# FAQ

## Can I look at all the files at a specific point in time in the repository?

Yes! It can be useful to look at the entire repository at a specific
point in time. This can be done by clicking the "Browse files" button on
the top-right side of the page when you've clicked on a specific commit
message. This will show you all files in the repository as they were at
that point in time :alarm_clock:

## Can I look at the full history of a specific file?

Yes! It's possible to explore the history of a specific file only. You
can access the history of a specific file by going to the file in the
repository and clicking the "History" button on the top-right side of
the page.
